name: PowerfulPoptart - LVL_2&3(Testing)
description:
* Important: multiple power ups are needed to pass the levels, please use "P" to bring up power up system, "A" and "D" to rotate the power up system, press "P" again to exit on the selected power up.

power up 1: Dash - a forward leap with a cool down time of 0.8 seconds

power up 2: Charge - a stronger forward leap with a cool down time of 3 seconds

"A" or "Left Arrow" for running to the left

"D" or "Right Arrow" for running to the right

running to the left or right + "Left Shift" or "Right Shift" to dash left and right or use power ups (Dash has a cool down time less than 1 second)

"Up Arrow" or "Space" to Jump

"R" to Restart the game anywhere if you don't want to wait until the hamster death audio to finish

"P" to bring up power up system, "A" and "D" to rotate the power up system, press "P" again to exit on the selected power up.
